General.Name: Standard Industries Limited
General.Description: Standard Industries Limited trades in textiles and chemical products in India. The company trades in cotton towels, bed sheets, interlining fabrics, cotton and blended dhotis, and cotton/PC blended and poly viscose suiting products; and cotton, PC poplin, and shirting products, as well as ready to stitch PC blended and Punjabi suits. It also engages in the property business; and manufactures common salt. The company was formerly known as Standard Mills Company Limited and changed its name to Standard Industries Limited in October 1989. Standard Industries Limited was incorporated in 1892 and is based in Mumbai, India.
